title: CHAMP SELECT STOPPED WORKING (RANKED)
body: My champ select stopped responding in ranked. This caused me to lose my promos. [Proof](http://imgur.com/a/Mio6L)

replies.body: That's not a good feeling, and I'd like to help you get this crash resolved.  There may be a corrupt with your game files, so the first step I suggest is going over our game crash guide.  Specifically, you can repair your files through there or our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs).  I recommend testing it out in a custom game after!  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up.
